law.catch_line: Department for Local Government -- Organization -- Commissioner.

text.section: The commissioner, with the approval of the Governor, shall appoint necessary deputies, assistants, attorneys, and other employees and shall fix their compensation and authorize payment of their expenses according to law.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 1, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 69, sec. 48, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984; and ch. 404, sec. 38, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 70, effective June 17, 1978.
